<<<api>>>: InputStream.readLine
<<<code>>>: String line;
while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
    ret.concat(line);
    System.out.println(line);
}
<<<explanation>>>: The issue is with the line `ret.concat(t)`. The `concat()` method returns a new string and does not modify the original string. So, you need to assign the concatenated string back to `ret` like `ret = ret.concat(t)`. Additionally, you can use the `readLine()` method of `BufferedReader` to read the response line by line until it returns null.
